name: Crush Boxes
description: Crush Boxes is a casual shooting game that physically clicks on launching shells to break through multi-structured obstacles for customs clearance, simple, casual, and decompression. One-button operation is easy to learn, dozens of cannons and shells are endless, each cannon has specific attributes, lightning, adsorption, freezing, black holes, shells to break glass, wooden boxes, visual effects and impact are addictive.
